TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceCredentials extends System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityCredentialsManager implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public Class ServiceCredentials Inherits SecurityCredentialsManager Implements IServiceBehavior
type ServiceCredentials = class inherit SecurityCredentialsManager interface IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 配置服务凭据。

span.span: Configures a service credential.

summary.span: 使用此类可指定服务的凭据，如 X.509 证书。

span.span: Use this class to specify the credential for the service such as an X.509 certificate.

summary.span: 此外，使用此类还可指定各种客户端凭据的验证模式，如用户名和密码验证。

span.span: Also, use this class to specify the authentication model for various client credentials such as user name and password validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类通过 用作 方法中的参数，并且由 属性返回。This class is used as a parameter in the method, by methods of the , and is returned by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写此类，以实现自定义服务凭据。The following code shows how to override this class to implement custom service credentials. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定要使用的证书，方法是调用由此属性返回的 对象的成员。You can specify the certificate to use by calling members of the object returned by this property. 你还可以使用客户端应用程序配置文件中的[<证书>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity)元素来设置此值。You can also set this value using the [<certificate>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 此代码演示如何指定服务使用的证书。This code shows how to specify the certificate that a service uses. 创建 类，后跟一个执行以下操作的复杂代码语句：A class is created, followed by a single complex code statement that does the following: - 属性用于访问 的实例。 property is used to access an instance of . - 然后 实例调用 。The instance then invokes . - 属性返回一个 对象，然后对其调用 方法。The property returns a object, on which the method is then called.
